input_text: Does Miniso India offer discounts or sales?
output_text: Yes, Miniso India frequently offers discounts, seasonal sales, and special promotions. Stay updated by checking their website or following them on social media.

input_text: Can I buy Miniso products online?
output_text: Yes, you can buy Miniso products online through their official website https://www.minisoindia.com and various e-commerce platforms like Amazon and Flipkart.

input_text: What payment methods does Miniso India accept?
output_text: Miniso India accepts credit/debit cards, UPI, digital wallets like Paytm and Google Pay, as well as cash on delivery for selected locations.

input_text: Does Miniso India offer gift cards?
output_text: Yes, Miniso India offers digital and physical gift cards that can be used for purchases in-store and online.

input_text: How can I track my Miniso India order?
output_text: Once your order is shipped, you will receive a tracking link via SMS and email. You can also track your order by logging into your Miniso India account.

input_text: What should I do if I receive a damaged product?
output_text: If you receive a damaged or defective product, contact Miniso India customer support within 24 hours of delivery to request a replacement or refund.

input_text: Does Miniso India offer bulk purchases for corporate gifting?
output_text: Yes, Miniso India provides bulk purchasing options for corporate gifts. You can contact their sales team for customized solutions.
Miniso follows ethical sourcing and manufacturing processes. However, for specific cruelty-free certifications, check individual product labels or descriptions.

input_text: How often does Miniso India introduce new products?
output_text: Miniso India introduces new products every season, with fresh collections arriving in stores and online frequently.

input_text: Does Miniso India provide franchise opportunities?
output_text: Yes, Miniso India offers franchise opportunities. Interested parties can apply through the official website’s franchise section.

input_text: Can I return a Miniso product without a receipt?
output_text: No, Miniso India requires an original receipt or proof of purchase for all returns and exchanges.
Miniso is committed to sustainable practices, including eco-friendly packaging and responsible sourcing of materials.
Yes, Miniso India offers a range of electronic accessories, including headphones, power banks, and phone cases.

input_text: What are the customer service hours of Miniso India?
output_text: Miniso India's customer service is available from 10:00 AM to 7:00 PM (Monday - Saturday).

input_text: Can I cancel my Miniso order after placing it?
output_text: Yes, you can cancel your order before it is shipped. Once shipped, cancellation is not possible.
